  • Method Details

    • optimize

      public void optimize(Perceptron perceptron, DataSet.Sample<Float> sample, ObjectiveFunction<Float> objective, int step)
      Description copied from interface: Optimizer.Stochastic
      Optimizes the given estimation function using a single sample and the specified objective function.

      Implementations typically calculate the gradient of the loss function for the given sample and update the parameters of the estimation function immediately, enabling online or stochastic optimization.

      Specified by:
      optimize in interface Optimizer.Stochastic<Perceptron, Float>
      Parameters:
      perceptron - the estimation function (model) to optimize
      sample - the training sample used for optimization
      objective - the objective function that defines the loss and parameterGradients
